title: [K-12] Workshop for Strengthening Competency-Based Language Education Task Design

context.prior_knowledge: Grasp of fundamental instructional design concepts and at least three years of secondary education experience
context.additional_context: Utilizes smartphone-based supplementary materials in offline collaborative learning settings

learning_goals: Learners can design Competency-Based Education (CBE) language learning tasks by applying the five phases of the Instructional Systems Design (ISD) methodology (needs analysis, objective setting, design, development, evaluation).
Learners can derive core elements of competency-based language tasks (assessment criteria, learning outcomes, feedback systems) by analyzing product-centered case studies.
Learners can submit improved learning task proposals incorporating peer and expert feedback through at least two formative evaluations.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
